attributes.action: introduce a special holiday to celebrate 300 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is the union between England and Scotland the oldest union of two countries? If so, this must be the most wonderful opportunity to celebrate our 300 years of fantastic history. 
I suggest we mark this event on the 2nd June 2007 - Her Majesty's official birthday.
